mapper.insert: insert into weizu_fund( code, name, type, manager, fund_scale, last_month_growth, last_three_month_growth, last_six_month_growth, last_year_growth, buy_min, buy_rate )values( #{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{manager}, #{fundScale}, #{lastMonthGrowth}, #{lastThreeMonthGrowth}, #{lastSixMonthGrowth}, #{lastYearGrowth}, #{buyMin}, #{buyRate} )
mapper.update: update weizu_fund set code=#{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, manager = #{manager}, fund_scale = #{fundScale}, last_month_growth = #{lastMonthGrowth}, last_three_month_growth = #{lastThreeMonthGrowth}, last_six_month_growth = #{lastSixMonthGrowth}, last_year_growth = #{lastYearGrowth}, buy_min = #{buyMin}, buy_rate = #{buyRate} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select fund.id, fund.code, fund.name, fund.type, fund.manager, fund.fund_scale, fund.last_month_growth, fund.last_three_month_growth, fund.last_six_month_growth, fund.last_year_growth, fund.buy_min, fund.buy_rate from weizu_fund as fund where id = #{id}

select fund.id, fund.code, fund.name, fund.type, fund.manager, fund.fund_scale, fund.last_month_growth, fund.last_three_month_growth, fund.last_six_month_growth, fund.last_year_growth, fund.buy_min, fund.buy_rate from weizu_fund as fund where fund.code = #{code}

select fund.id, fund.code, fund.name, fund.type, fund.manager, fund.fund_scale, fund.last_month_growth, fund.last_three_month_growth, fund.last_six_month_growth, fund.last_year_growth, fund.buy_min, fund.buy_rate from weizu_fund as fund where 1 = 1
